question.text: The correct difference between the ovary of rose and china rose is

options.text: Rose has superior ovary while China rose has inferior ovary
Rose has inferior ovary while China rose has superior ovary
Rose has semi-inferior ovary while China rose has inferior ovary
Rose has semi-inferior ovary while China rose has superior ovary

solution.text: Rose has perigynous flowers in which the gynoecium is present in the center and other whorls of the flower are located on the rim of the thalamus almost at the same level. Thus, it has a semi-inferior ovary. China rose has hypogynous flowers in which all the floral whorls are attached below the gynoecium. Thus, it has superior ovary.
